QuestionDef.QText: Involvement of Human Subjects changed from last year?
Change(s) within scope of current objectives and approved?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: (If not in scope or not approved, explanation required.)

SelectionDef.Value: Yes, in scope but not approved

QuestionDef.QText: Research exempt from regulations under E4 (45 CFR 46)?

SelectionDef.Value: ET = Early Stage of Technology Development

QuestionDef.QText: Gender and minority recruitment/retention appropriate and on schedule?

QuestionDef.QInstructions: (If corrective plan unacceptable, award cannot be made)

QuestionDef.QText: Gender Code needs to be changed or assigned?
Minority Code needs to be changed or assigned?
Children Code needs to be changed or assigned?
All sites (grantee and all performance sites engaged in research involving human subjects) have an OHRP-approved assurance of compliance?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: (Grantee must have assurance even if research involving human subjects is conducted only at other performance sites.)

QuestionDef.QText: Is the project viable if the site(s) does not receive assurance?
Date PI referred to OHRP website
Research identified on face page as approved under expedited IRB review?

QuestionDef.QInstructions: (If No, explanation required.If No, award will be held for full IRB Review.)

QuestionDef.QText: Research candidate for Certificate of Confidentiality?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: (If Yes, informational term will be used first year identified as candidate.)

QuestionDef.QText: Does the award support Phase I/Phase II studies?
Data and Safety Monitoring (DSM) conducted by NCI or NCI-approved contractor?
Previously approved DSM Plan still acceptable?
New or revised DSM Plan is:
QuestionDef.QInstructions: (If not approved, award will be held.)

QuestionDef.QText: Does the award support Phase III study?
Are the DSM Board members approved (by NCI Division Director or designee) and documented?

SelectionDef.Value: Approved and documentation sent to GAB

QuestionDef.QText: All sites (grantee and any performance sites) engaged in research involving live vertebrate animals have an OLAW-approved animal welfare assurance?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: (If No, award must be held unless OLAW approves assurance(s) or issuance of restricted award.Grantee must have an assurance even if research involving live vertebrate animals is conducted at other performance sites.)

QuestionDef.QText: If site(s) in 9.a.3. does not receive assurance, will project be viable?
Date assurance documents sent to OLAW:
Use of vertebrate animals changed from last year?
Change(s) within scope of current objectives and approved?

SelectionDef.Value: Yes, in scope and not approved

QuestionDef.QInstructions: (If Yes, informational term will be used.)

QuestionDef.QText: Research objectives/goals/scope changed significantly and approved since last award?*
Substantial foreign involvement added since last award?
Is project viable without site(s) needing State Department concurrence?
Date NIH Form 1820 sent to Fogarty Center.
Sufficient scientific justification included in application?
QuestionDef.QInstructions: (If No, explanation required so GAB can follow up with grantee.)

SelectionDef.Value: Yes, approved but has no impact

QuestionDef.QText: Are there significant changes in the level of effort of key personnel?

SelectionDef.Value: Yes, approved but has no impact

QuestionDef.QText: Are any inventions mentioned in the text of the progress report that are not noted on the face page of the progress report?
Explain the actions that have been taken.
QuestionDef.QInstructions: (Explanation required. Discuss with PI and report invention using IEdison Report Lite: https://dali.cc.nih.gov/erl/. This link requires a password. Call 301-435-1986 for a password.)

QuestionDef.QText: Any program concerns that should be resolved prior to issuing an award?
